name: Sky Streaker - Gumball Climbing Arcade Game
name_original: Sky Streaker - Gumball Climbing Arcade Game
description:
Dodge clothes, grab coins, and outrun Gumball and Darwin as you climb sky high!

This app is only available in English. Don't worry. It's super fun and doesn't have much text. Have fun!

NO PANTS, NO PROBLEM!
Richard Watterson is determined to break the world record… for not wearing pants! Keep Richard one step ahead of the Gumball, or your hot streak is over!

BLING BLING!
Dress up Richard with awesome accessories! Each item unlocks a new power, like Alan the Balloon, giant coins, new levels, and mega score multipliers.

CRAZY EASY TO PLAY
Tap to switch sides and keep Richard climbing. Learn the game in seconds, play for hours!


********************

If you're having any problems with this app, feel free to contact us at advanced.platforms@turner.com. Tell us about the issues you're running into as well as what device and OS version you're using.
